name: Goofy Cannon
description:
A cannon above Earth, protecting it!

Play this simple and easy game and shoot down the falling boxes from Sky! There are 2 difficulty levels, in day/night environment. This is my first upload at Itch.io your feedback will help me improve this game further.

This is v1.0 of Goofy Cannon, stay tuned for updates...

 Watch the quick video I made on its making, available on Youtube.

Link: 

 If you want to make a similar game, I've made source files available on GitHub.

 

Thanks a lot for coming by, your reviews are much appreciated. :D
